LanguageData.SY_YCA.NumberOfAmmoColumns_title: Number of ammo columns in assign tab
LanguageData.SY_YCA.NumberOfAmmoColumns_desc: Set the number of ammo columns to be shown in the "Assign" tab Reducing the amount of columns will throw errors when you load a save which had more - these can be ignored, they will be gone on future saves. Requires restarting the game!
LanguageData.SY_YCA.LowAmmoFactorForReloadWhileWaitin: Drafted pawns will reload their weapon if its ammo falls below this limit while they are waiting (idle)
LanguageData.SY_YCA.EjectAmmoOnDowned_desc: Toggles whether ammo is ejected from weapons when a pawn goes down or dies
LanguageData.SY_YCA.AmmoDroppedOnDownedFactor_title: Ammo percentage dropped from inventory on death/downed
LanguageData.SY_YCA.AmmoDroppedOnDownedFactor_desc: Reduces the amount of ammo dropped from inventory when an enemy or ally is downed or killed Has no effect if the pawn carries no ammo on them This setting allows reducing the amount of ammo gained from raids making acquiring ammo more difficult
LanguageData.SY_YCA.AmmoInWeaponOnDownedFactor_title: Ammo percentage in dropped weapon on death/downed
LanguageData.SY_YCA.AmmoInWeaponOnDownedFactor_desc: Reduces the amount of ammo in or ejected from weapons dropped by downed or killed allies and enemies This setting allows reducing the amount of ammo gained from raids making acquiring ammo more difficult
LanguageData.SY_YCA.ReloadGizmo_desc: Reload weapon using ammo carried in inventory Right click for more options
LanguageData.SY_YCA.NoAmmoToEject: {pawn}: there was no ammo left to eject from {thing}
LanguageData.SY_YCA.ReloadWeaponFromInventory_tooltip: Reload currently equipped weapon using ammo from inventory
LanguageData.SY_YCA.ReloadWeaponFromSurrounding_toolt: Search for ammo nearby and use it to reload currently equipped weapon
LanguageData.SY_YCA.ReloadAllWeaponFromInventory_tool: Reload all weapons equipped and in inventory using ammo from inventory
LanguageData.SY_YCA.ReloadAllWeaponFromSurrounding_to: Search for ammo nearby and use it to reload all weapons equipped or in inventory
LanguageData.SY_YCA.RestockAmmoFromSurrounding_toolti: Restock inventory with ammo assigned to the pawn via the "assign" ammo settings or assigned drug policy Search for ammo nearby and put it into the inventory
LanguageData.SY_YCA.NoAmmoNearby: {pawn} could not find enough '{ammo}' nearby, missing {count}
LanguageData.SY_YCA.NoAmmoInventory: {pawn} could not find enough '{ammo}' in their inventory, missing {count}
LanguageData.SY_YCA.NoAmmoRestock: {pawn} could not find enough '{ammo}', missing {count} out of a desired {max}
LanguageData.SY_YCA.OutOfAmmo: {pawn} ran out of ammo and could not find any to reload
